docs_row.name: Payment_features_of_the_Hotel
docs_row.description: Retrieve information about the payment features and options available at a specific hotel. EndPoint: /api/v1/hotels/getPaymentFeatures

hotel_id.description:
`hotel_id` can be retrieved from `api/v1/hotels/searchHotels`**(Search Hotels)** or `api/v1/hotels/searchHotelsByCoordinates`**(Search Hotels By Coordinates
)** endpoint in **Hotels** collection.
